DOC.brief_title: COX-2 Inhibitor Study In Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) least 12 month . Required nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAID ) COX2 inhibitor RA least 5 7 day week 4 week prior screen . Exclusion criterion : Any history cardiovascular disease ( e.g. , heart attack , stroke , congestive heart failure , uncontrolled high blood pressure ) , document peripheral arterial insufficiency symptomatic , clinically significant claudication , history peripheral arterial embolism . Have active stomach ulcer history stomach tear bleeding .
